name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
description: A luxurious, long-wearing matte lipstick with a velvety finish. Infused with nourishing oils for comfortable wear. Experience intense color payoff and a smooth, non-drying feel.

name: Radiant Glow Foundation
description: Achieve a flawless, radiant complexion with this lightweight foundation. Provides buildable coverage and a natural, dewy finish. Enriched with hyaluronic acid for all-day hydration.

name: Midnight Sparkle Eyeshadow Palette
description: Unleash your inner artist with this versatile eyeshadow palette. Features 12 highly pigmented shades in matte, shimmer, and glitter finishes. Perfect for creating day-to-night looks.

name: Silk Finish Primer
description: Create a smooth canvas for makeup application with this silk-finish primer. Minimizes pores, blurs imperfections, and extends makeup wear. Lightweight and non-greasy formula.

name: Volumizing Lash Mascara
description: Get dramatic, voluminous lashes with this intense black mascara. The specially designed brush coats every lash for maximum impact. Smudge-proof and long-lasting.
